ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Farewell Shada; safe journey
ygData.msgSnippet: Grats Sartori!!!!! From a fellow Veeshan bard... Heh, and I was excited to ding 53 and get Song of Twilight :-) Was on a failed Vox raid this week and got so
ygData.messageBody:
Grats Sartori!!!!! From a fellow Veeshan bard...

Heh, and I was excited to ding 53 and get Song of Twilight :-)

Was on a failed Vox raid this week and got so fed up with the munchkins (the
really bad players seem to have made it to lvl 50 now) that I decided to go
and lvl to 53 so I would never deal with crap like that again...

Of course I immediatly get an invite to Fear (thus no xp) and spend the
nexty 8 hours clearing it. We even got to kill the enraged? golem (the
thing that the broken golem spawns). Got my tendril and an imbrued bracer
(from a cube).

But I managed to get enough time at Dog Capt on Saturday to hit 53 :) (sigh
I leave 52 with neither scale and without Selo's Drums)

Elfson Allegro 53 Veeshan
(once again the free range bard for hire)
